participant_1.background:
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I remember feeling safe and loved when my mom would take me to the park.
i am in a rock band.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.
I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking.

i work at google.

I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.

content.text: How's it going?
Doing well! Thanks for asking! How are you?
Can't complain, just got done with a long day at work.
Oh no, that must have been tough. What do you do?
I work at a local bakery, it's a lot of work but I love it.
That's awesome! I've always loved baking, but I don't get to do it nearly enough.
You should try to find some time to bake, it's really relaxing.
I will! Do you have any tips for me?
Sure! Just start with some simple recipes and then work your way up to more complicated ones.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely give it a try.
You're welcome!
What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love making cookies, they're so easy and they always turn out delicious.
Me too! I love chocolate chip cookies.
Me too! Those are my favorite.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! We should bake together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We'll have to set something up soon.
Sounds good
